1100011100110101 1011110001110010 0 -> sum: 1000001110100111, cout: 1

0010111011101010 1011101000111110 1 -> sum: 1110100100101001, cout: 0
0011001100000000 0101010100010011 1 -> sum: 1000100000010100, cout: 0
1010000100000001 0110100110100000 1 -> sum: 0000101010100010, cout: 1
0011000111000001 0101001010011111 1 -> sum: 1000010001100001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
